name: Plasma Bounce
description:
The space station where your lab is located has been invaded. the station is lost.

In a desperate attempt you put on your relativistic suit used to handle an experimental plasma ball.

In tuned with the plasma ball while vibrating near lightspeed the world around you slows down.

Now is your chance to launch the plasma ball at the invaders and try to take out as many as possible.

Make this chance count.

Controls:

Put on you VR headset (Tested only on Oculus Rift S) and your motion controllers.

Each trigger will extend your paddle for longer reach.
The Grip buttons will recall the ball to you.

Swing at or reflect the Plasma Ball to send it into your enemies or to stop laser bullets from hitting you.

Y button will also Reset your position if needed.
